programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Little Penguin Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching

programme.desc: Cornish king crab is on the menu for Rick as he heads out of Newquay to catch and cook this tasty crustacean. Afterwards, he takes a trip inland to Bodmin Moor to meet Robin Hanbury Tenison, one of the 20th century's last great explorers. His farm is home to one of Cornwall's most ambitious rewilding projects, where Robin's son, Merlin, has recently introduced a pair of wild beavers who are doing their best to restore biodiversity in this corner of Cornwall.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Chair Museum / The Legend Of Crackerfoot - Archibald's plan to help Sage recover his beloved rocking chair hits a snag. Archibald and his siblings scour the woods for the legendary Crackerfoot.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep19
programme.desc: The Fandom Menace / Moby Dot - Lotta enters a contest to win an empanada date that turns out to be a scam. Dot desperately pursues a rare albino hornet terrorizing the park.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep19
programme.desc: Mall Is Well / Taco Tank - Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall.//Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Chair Museum / The Legend Of Crackerfoot - Archibald's plan to help Sage recover his beloved rocking chair hits a snag. Archibald and his siblings scour the woods for the legendary Crackerfoot.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep19
programme.desc: Le Grand Derriere / I'M Your Boovest Fan - Lucy changes after becoming the first human-chef at a fancy Boov restaurant; Oh is an obsessed superfan of a tee-ball team and uses Boov-tech to cheat.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep19
programme.desc: That'S Sooo Rob - Julien’s former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep19
programme.desc: The Swiss Mess - The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeard’s chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep19
programme.desc: Fomo-Opup / Lost In The Woods - Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Egg Nag/Game On - The Mighty Ones accidentally knock a bird's Egg out of its nest and must take turns trying to incubate the incredibly annoying Egg until it hatches. / The Mighty Ones move into a board game in the yard that they believe to be a "city," and it's all fun and games until Berry's capitalist greed gets the best of her.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive’S Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Shadowy Syndrome Of The Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like “Piper” can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep19
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter Two - On a quest to find the power gem of fire, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Hawaii. They're confronted with another monstrous guardian inside of a volcano in order to retrieve the gem... but wind up losing the gem to a surfing competition that uses it as part of their surf trophy

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep19
programme.desc: The Zippleback Experience - After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep19
programme.desc: The Ark Of Taujee - The team sets off to rescue the people of the dying lava planet of Tajueer

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep45
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Pile Of Cabbages - When Noddy comes to give Smartysaurus an invitation to Queen Sparklewings's picnic, there's a big pile of cabbages blocking her front door. Noddy investigates: who left the big pile of cabbages there and why? And will he be able to solve the case in time for the Royal Picnic?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Queen'S Special Gift - The Knights have been away travelling around Toyland and they each return with a special gift for the Queen. But the last Knight to arrive back was so busy having fun that he forgot to bring back a present for the Queen. Noddy assures him the Queen won't mind but the poor Knight is adamant he must give her something. Noddy sets out to help him find the perfect gift.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep47
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pirates' Missing Treasure - When the Pockets find an old treasure map, the Pirates are delighted. They race off to find the treasure. Only to come back rather confused. They found a treasure chest but it ran away! Noddy investigates: "What's happened to the Pirates' treasure?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Frozen Toys - Noddy and Big Ears come to Fable Forest to see the Queen Sparklewings's magic crystal collection. But when they arrive at the Fairy Castle, they find all the toys there frozen like statues. What's going on. It's up to Noddy to investigate and help his friends return to their normal selves.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep19
programme.desc: Lots Of Raa'S In The Jungle - Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals, they charge around being a pride of lions, a tower of giraffes etc… until Zebby wonders what zebras do… together the animals discover that zebras stampede… which is great fun and very noisy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep20
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Things - Raa Raa wants to show Topsy his three favourite things. But when he gets to his friends house, they have disappeared. Raa Raa and his friends set out on a noisy adventure to find the missing objects

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep45
programme.desc: Crash Landing - Hellie makes an emergency landing. Despite everyone's efforts, Hellie won't fly again… what could the problem be?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep46
programme.desc: Plugger'S New Job - James has broken down so Mama Mia comandeers Plugger to run her about. Mama Mia has a wonderful time with Plugger and James is jealous. He tries to remedy the situation with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep47
programme.desc: Big Chris Gets Lucky - Big Chris realises that he only ever has good luck when he has his lucky mascot with him. But what happens when he loses it on race day?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep48
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Fun Run - Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Big Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it without even realising?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep23
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Creature Catcher / Slugby - Revenge of the Creature Catcher Casper, Mantha and Ra accidentally lead Jimmy's father to the underworld.Slugby. To prove that the teachers haven't gone soft, Alder and Dash stage a Slugby match.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep24
programme.desc: You Oughta Be In Pictures / Crypt Critters - You Oughta Be in Pictures When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. Crypt Critters Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh — Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio De La Niñera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Bizarre Blitzkrieg Of The Bothersome Butt-Erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep20
programme.desc: Snow Way Out - Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep20
programme.desc: Desert Scraptors - When the Desert Scraptors mistakenly think Click-Clack is their leader, D-Structs' plan to have them attack Ty and the crew is derailed.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King'S Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Olivia Ep39
programme.desc: Olivia Paints A Mural - Olivia is inspired after a visit to the museum with her family, and decides she's going to become a great painter herself. She gets right down to business, painting a portrait of Ian. When she sees a mural painting on a building wall, she wonders if she'll ever find a space big enough for her big ideas!

programme.title: Olivia Ep40
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Ducklings - After a fun day at the park, Olivia and Ian return home with some unexpected visitors – a mother duck and her ducklings! The harder Olivia and Ian try to keep he ducks a secret from Mother and Father, the more household mischief they all seem to get into.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars… who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh — Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg/Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Lucky And The Lion - When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep20
programme.desc: The Cheer Hunter / Dot'S Entertainment - Zoe invites Lotta to join her cheer squad and Audrey gets jealous. Dot becomes obsessed with making people laugh after telling her first joke.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh — Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep20
programme.desc: Scared Crazy / Superslushious - Tip and Oh go camping but soon learn about a crazy Boov who scares everyone; Oh upgrades Slushious to “Superslushious” things get out of hand.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep20
programme.desc: A Wanderer'S Christmas - Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepy Caterpillar/Code Of Silence - When Twig introduces Leaf to his new caterpillar friend Josh, Leaf must overcome his debilitating fear of caterpillars in order to give Josh a chance. / Hot tempered Rabbit is sick of the noise from the Mighty Ones’ games, so he makes them a bet that they can’t go for a whole day without making a sound. Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio De La Niñera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Bizarre Blitzkrieg Of The Bothersome Butt-Erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep20
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter Three - Rocky and Bullwinkle battle one more guardian to get the final power gem – the wind gem. programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep49
programme.desc: The Case Of The Diabolo - Noddy's delighted to be given a diabolo by Big Ears. But when Noddy tries it out for the first time, the diabolo crashes and breaks in two. Even worse, when Noddy goes to retrieve the two halves, he finds that they're both missing! Noddy needs to investigate. Where is his new toy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep50
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Trophy - Queen Sparklewings invites the toys to play a game of Catch the Flag at the castle. But when the special trophy goes missing, Noddy has to investigate. Where is the vanished trophy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep51
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Cows - When Train hears cows near the railway tracks, he's worried that he might scare them and he insists on going really slow. Trouble is there's a load of Builders on board who need to get to Brickabuild fast. Noddy decides to investigate. Where are the lost cows?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep52
programme.desc: The Case Of The Burst Tyres - There's a race at the loop-the-loop. Deltoid brings the prize for the winner: a beautiful model of the loop the loop circuit made by Pat Pat and Smartysaurus. All the toys are very excited, but before the race starts the tyres of Deltoid's tribike are burst! Could it be one of the contestants trying to prevent him from winning the race? Noddy needs to find out so that the race can take place.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Bad Hank - When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy just like Shadow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure Hunt - Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups redden Koningin Tok-tok - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! Now it's up to the pups to save Chickaletta from her fowl new fans.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lamp Post - Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Construction Contest - To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles! But when Crusher sends them far away, it'll take all of their construction skills combined to make it back before time runs out.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep620
programme.desc: The Solar Light Spectacular! - When giant robot Buster steals all the batteries that power Solar City, which runs on the sun's energy, it's up to Solar Power Workers Nonny and Goby to stop him and get the lights back on before the big light show is cancelled!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep612
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Laughs-a-Lot! - Jesters Goby and Gil arrive in the Kingdom of NeverLaugh, where King Grumpfish declares that he'll outlaw laughter forever if no one can make him laugh before sundown! Will the Jesters be able to crack him up before it's too late?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608

programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses A Best Friend - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia - When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep611
programme.desc: A Big Splash! - On the Shimmy-Shimmy Islands, everyone's preparing for Queen Zooli's Dance Party! But each time they practice their songs for the party, they're splashed by a huge wave! Will they find who's causing the waves before the party is cancelled?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep106
programme.desc: We Love Nature - Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Barbaprank! - It is pranks day. The Barbababies have fun finding new pranks... until Barbabright spots the track of a dinosaur.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock / Pups Save a Good Mayor - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty / Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park. // DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Mr Potato's Christmas Show - Hoor-oink! It's Christmas, and Peppa's daycare is going to the theater to see a special play about the holiday. Some people have never been to a theater before.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep611

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Lifguard Blaze! - Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep84
programme.desc: Musical Statues - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po enjoy a game of musical statues. It takes the Teletubbies a few turns to work out what to do when the music stops; they must stand very still.

programme.desc: Peas - Dee encourages a friend to say peas and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.desc: It's time to post a picture - JoJo has drawn a picture to show Great Gran Gran over a video call, but just as she's about to show it, the internet goes down!

programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.desc: Monty Repeats Himself - A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Weather Prediction Predicament - There's a storm brewing after Glitch's fake weather report puts the cadets in danger.

programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: The Drum Ep4
programme.desc: In a Drum special, Dan Bourchier and the panel take a look at the issues surrounding the date January 26 from the perspective of Australia's Indigenous people.

programme.desc: Governor-General David Hurley delivers his annual Australia Day Message to the nation.

programme.title: Australia Day Live 2023
programme.desc: As the sun sets on our national day, a concert featuring Casey Donovan, Dami Im, Christine Anu and her daughter Zipporah, William Barton, Isaiah Firebrace, Anthony Callea, Tim Campbell, James Morrison, Emma Pask and more.

programme.title: Things That Made Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Once dismissed by Henry Ford as a 'kangaroo chaser', the ute has become an Australian classic. It's part of life in the country and the city.

programme.title: The World Ep19
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - In this special 100th episode of Back Roads, Heather Ewart looks at The Great Australian Pub. Our very own unique style of watering hole, the humble pub sits at the heart of many communities.

programme.title: Sovereignty: 50 Years of the Tent Embassy
programme.desc: On January 26, 1972 a small group of Indigenous Australians began a sit-in protest on the lawns of Parliament House in Canberra that led to one of the most pivotal moments in Australia's social history.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep19
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: The Drum Ep4
programme.desc: In a Drum special, Dan Bourchier and the panel take a look at the issues surrounding the date January 26 from the perspective of Australia's Indigenous people.

programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: The World Ep19
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: WugulOra Morning Ceremony 2023
programme.desc: WugulOra, meaning 'One Mob', is a special moment on 26th January acknowledging our shared history and the traditional custodians of the land, with performances by Aboriginal dancers and singers.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Michael Parkinson interviews guests Spike Milligan, Harry Secombe, Barry Tuckwell and Gough Whitlam.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 30 - Sophie Thomson meets a caper cultivator, Costa Georgiadis learns about a composting critter, Guest Presenter Hannah Maloney helps a young couple blitz their backyard and Tino Carnevale visits a 'sub-tropical' Hobart garden.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep20
programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you the latest news and interviews. Plus Tony Armstrong with sport, Madeleine Morris with finance and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep20
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Joe O'Brien in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep20
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 30 - Sophie Thomson goes behind the scenes at a rose farm, Jane Edmanson rejuvenates potted plants, Costa Georgiadis visits a plant loving couple and we meet a landscape architect behind some of Australia's most iconic gardens.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Comedian and artist Anh Do paints controversial, outspoken and passionate athlete, Anthony Mundine. Anthony talks about what drives him and what makes him tick. (Final)

programme.title: New Gold Mountain Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - When the charming, but ethically dubious Chinese headman Wei Shing stumbles across a valuable new gold seam, he sets out to enrich himself. But when the body of a murdered European woman turns up, he finds himself implicated.

programme.title: Belonging(s) Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The story of Mary's arranged marriage in the 19th century is captured in a black and white portrait. A century later we look at the wedding accessories of Eunice, who has been happily married for more than 70 years.

programme.title: Back To Nature Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Aaron and Holly visit Arrernte country in Central Australia. They meet Traditional Owners and look at the Milky Way with astrophysicist and Gamilaraay woman Karlie Noon, from inside an impact crater. (Final)

programme.title: Back Roads Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart heads to King Island, in Bass Strait half-way between Tasmania and Victoria. A place famous for cheese, seafood and the treacherous Roaring 40's winds, she finds out why many who've left are coming back.

programme.title: ABC News Ep8

programme.title: ABC News Ep8
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Landline Ep11
programme.desc: This summer we bring you a tasty sample of some of the best Landline stories from 2022. 80 years since Australia's "Land Girls" answered the call, plus a Mallee ghost town that once offered a new life to soldier settlers.

programme.title: ABC News Ep8
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One Ep4
programme.desc: Before winning the Australian Open and Wimbledon, World #1 tennis player Ash Barty sat down with Kurt Fearnley in 2020 to talk about winning the French Open, the importance of family and time off court due to the pandemic.

programme.title: ABC News Ep8
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Talented Darwin girl Jessica Mauboy joins Anh in his arts studio to talk about her journey to chart and television success, and the family that made it possible.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: Australia's Remote Islands Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Norfolk Island is in the South Pacific Ocean, and has a fascinating, but brutal history of convicts and mutineers. Many of its people are direct descendants of Fletcher Christian and his bounty mutineers. (Final)

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep8
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep8
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Architect Annalise and project manager Kim have a plan to turn their tiny 1850s Carlton terrace into a multi-storied modern home with a large garden and a triple car-stacker. Their secret - to dig down and build up and out.

programme.title: Muster Dogs Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The puppies are now one year old and have all gathered with their owners to complete their final 12-month assessment. One pup shines brighter than the pack and is rightfully crowned Champion Muster Dog! (Final)

programme.title: Dream Gardens Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - A city family navigate the hurdles of transforming a neglected fifty-two hectare property into a productive garden and orchard. But with no farming experience, are they up to the enormous challenge?

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep59
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Making a first home purchase is a big decision for any young couple. Presenter Del Irani meets a couple who want a sizeable period home in Castlemaine, near Melbourne. But the search may be hindered by their budget.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Meet a team of rangers and researchers who are working together to grow a wider understanding of cultural burning, and the role it plays in caring for Country.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep8
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep39
programme.desc: Australia's failure to protect children in detention. For the first time we show a dangerous restraining practice used on children in WA, and ongoing mistreatment inside a notorious NT youth detention centre. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep8
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Surviving Extinction
programme.desc: Australia has some of the most unique animals anywhere on the planet and also one of the highest rates of threatened species. We look at efforts to save five unique Australian species that are on the verge of extinction.

programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Namila heads to McClelland to meet Fiona Foley; a musician turned molecular biologist finds inspiration in the coronavirus genome; portraits of country pub patrons; and a visit to Broome Performing Arts Co.
